price: To će biti samo glas jedan, i svi će odjednom čekati,
arabic: فَإِنَّمَا هِيَ زَجۡرَةٞ وَٰحِدَةٞ فَإِذَا هُمۡ يَنظُرُونَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: fa-innamā hiya zajratun wāḥidatun fa-idhā hum yanẓurūna
